      • Raster

        public Raster()

      • Raster

        public Raster(String path,
              float[][] zArray,
              float xLeftLowerCorner,
              float yLeftLowerCorner,
              float cellSize,
              int nbCols,
              int nbRows)
        Instantiate a grid raster type
        Parameters:
        path - Absolute path of the file
        zArray - Two-dimensional array representing the 2d grid and containing z values
        xLeftLowerCorner - X left lower corner
        yLeftLowerCorner - Y left lower corner
        cellSize - Size of a cell, in meters (m)
        nbCols - Column number
        nbRows - Row number

      • getSimpleHeight

        public float getSimpleHeight(float posX,
                             float posY)
        Get corresponding height from a x,y couple of points
        This method doesn't perform interpolation, it gets nearest cell and return corresponding value.
        Parameters:
        posX - position x
        posY - position y
        Returns:
        height from x,y position
